   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Projects
=============

Projects is meant to store finish simulations that
wait to be analised

The current space is:

    - Capacity: 1T
    - Occupied : 859.98GB  
    - Available: 140GB
    - Usage : 86%

Under **/home/<user_name>** each user has his own private folder
